name: uvu The Snow Fox
description:
uvu The Snow Fox is an immersive atmospheric walking simulator.

You play as uvu, a baby snow fox. While playing and running around as little foxes do, you were accidentally separated from your mother. Now, you need to reunite with your mother before the dark comes and the creatures of the night begin their hunt.

  • Retrace your mother's steps to reunite with her.
  • Don't stray too far out or the hunter and his dogs will come for you.
  • Forage for berries to gain a temporary speed boost.
  • Reunite with your mother before night time comes.

This game was initially made for the Global Game Jam 2021 and polished up afterwards. Enjoy!

Controls

WASD to move
